item.title: An Outside-In Approach to Discover Unknown Codebases
item.description: Jumping into a new codebase is never easy. It takes time, patience, and often a fair bit of frustration. And when the codebase is legacy — undocumented, inconsistent, and complex — the challenge grows infinitely...In this article, based on the work we've done with my colleague Alexandre Link to article: https://goatreview.com/outside-approach-discover-unknown-codebases/
